name: obsInfo
title: Observation Information
description: Information about the observing scan and subscan(s)

name: obsComment
title: Observation Comment
description: Free-from textual description of the data or other relevant information, useful when obsGoal is OTHER

name: obsDate
title: Date
description: Date of observation  at start of integration. FITS standard format

name: band
title: Band
description: Information about the spectral observing band

name: formula
title: Line formula
description: expected line(s) identification formula. e.g. "CO".  Single ID or comma separated list

name: transition
title: Line transition
description: expected line(s) transition, e.g. “1-0”. Single ID or comma separated list

name: contSens
title: Cont. Sensitivity (K)
description: continuum sensitivity (Jy/beam). Not needed for SLR

name: lineSens
title: SL Sensitivity (K)
description: spectral line sensitivity in 1 km/s window (K of Ta*).

name: projectTitle
title: Project Title
description: The title of the project as submitted by the PI

name: totalIntTime
title: Total Integration Time (s)
description: Total on-source integration time for all obsnums this ObsDataList

name: velType
title: Velocity Type
description: Velocity type of FITS cube axis3, either frequency or velocity

name: observatory
title: Observatory
description: The observatory or facility where the data was obtained.

name: LMTInstrument
title: Instrument
description: The instrument used to collect the data.

name: targetName
title: Target
description: Astronomical Objects represented in the data (Given as SIMBAD recognizable names preferred).

name: calibrationLevel
title: Calibration Level
description: Integer indicating level of calibration. 0 = no calibration, 1 = first level, 2 = second level, etc
